title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
creator_credit: United Artists, Constantin Film, PEA, Arturo González Producciones Cinematográficas S.A., Sergio Donati, Sergio Leone, Luciano Vincenzoni, Carlo Simi, Agenore Incrocci, Furio Scarpelli and Alberto Grimaldi
headline_credit: Germany, Italy, Spain and United States of America, 1966
brief_description: While the Civil War rages between the Union and the Confederacy, three men – a quiet loner, a ruthless hit man and a Mexican bandit – comb the American Southwest in search of a strongbox containing $200,000 in stolen gold.

constellations_other.name: Significant sounds
constellations_other.description: The arrival of synchronised sound dramatically changed the movie business, allowing filmmakers to use sound in new and exciting ways which developed the use sound into own film language.
